com.layers.app.data

Class LocationDataService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.layers.app.data.LocationDataService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocationDataInterface

    public class LocationDataService
extends java.lang.Object
implements LocationDataInterface

    Data Access Object that retrieves data requested from the LocationBusinessService. Most queries are dependent to the location the data is relevent to.

    All querys are performed in a prepared statement to protect the arguments from SQL injection. Prepared Statement queries and result sets may be assembled and parsed, respectively, using a helper function from the class this DAO is relevent to.

    See Also:
    Location, LocationBusinessService
